thumb.title: Animated Violins
thumb.text: A Product Presentation video made with the 3D animation software Blender. The purpose was to create and present a video showing the design of a fictitious product.

page.subTitle: Stringvibe - Wooden violins
page.text: This 5 seconds long video I created in Blender, a license free 3D animation program with the purpose to create and present a video showing the design of a fictitious product. I first modeled the violin, set up 5 different scenes with several light effects to make it look appealing, and then finished by animating adding some explaining text. I wanted to create that electric feeling in order to make it clear that the violin is electric.
